title: The Red Jumper: Emily is a young girl from the East of Scotland who is faced with quite a few obstacles before quickly realising the hurtful truth of her long term fiance, but not all is as it seems.
description: Emily has a rough start in life but thinks her relationship with her fiance is solid, but not all is as it seems when she quickly realises the truth. One thing about Emily is that she can be quite sarcastic, so when she meets her CEO for the first time, her sarcasm is silenced as she is stunned to find out that she has actually met him before. A lot of happy and sad moments for Emily as her life turns into one big roller coaster.
author: D.L.  Taylor
